    def __init__(self):
        self._users = [] # Internal list to store users

            self._users.append(user)
            logger.info(f"User '{user}' added.")
            return True
        logger.warning(f"Attempted to add existing user '{user}'.")
        return False

    def get_users(self):
        # Return a copy to prevent external modification of the internal list
        logger.debug("Retrieving all users.")
        return list(self._users)

    def remove_user(self, user):
        try:
            self._users.remove(user)
            logger.info(f"User '{user}' removed.")
            return True
        except ValueError:
            logger.warning(f"Attempted to remove non-existent user '{user}'.")
            return False
